website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Alpha NEX-3N isn't as good a performer as its predecessor, but it does include a collapsible power zoom lens and it comes at a lower price.
cons: Screen not as sharp as on previous NEX models
Kit lens isn't the best performer

customer_reviews.title: Great,for the price, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing for the cost, but it is not as good as a full DSLR, my sister has a Canon EOS (no clue what model) and those pictures seem to come out better. This camera is pretty small (for a mirror-less camera) and fits well in a coat pocket. It is difficult to find bags for this camera because of it's medium, not-quite-pocket-size dimensions. The "Superior Auto" mode is the best I have ever seen on a camera, it takes vastly superior pictures compared to a Canon ELPH 330. If you are looking for a cheaper, almost pocket sized DSLR, then I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: jlloyd50

customer_reviews.title: Pre-plan if you want to use the flash.
customer_reviews.text: This camera works incredibly well. Put it in the camera in "Superior Auto" mode and you are set for 98% of the time. If you need to use flash, there are some caveats: The flash will not just pop up and go off when you need it. You must manually raise it by pushing the "thunderbolt" button. AND if you have the steady shot function turned on, the flash with not go off. This is stupid, but that's the way it works. Found this out the hard way, at a restaurant with a table full of relatives and a puzzled waiter.
customer_reviews.author: Jimsterdotcom

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera with a lot of features and with the option to change lenses. The claim that the screen if low resolution is true, we often find ourselves reviewing the pictures and thinking they are not very good, but after transfering and looking in a monitor, turns out great. This is capable of getting excellent pictures, but you do have to know a little bit of the basics at least to maximize its features. It shoots good pictures on auto modes, but I recommend learning a little about photography and shoot on manual. (P.S.: Get a proper lens cleaner)
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Huge Step Up
customer_reviews.text: This camera has turned out to be a huge step up from my previous point-and-shoot cameras. On several occasions now I have been shooting in conditions that would have produced marginal pictures with what I had been using before, and wound up with 'keepers'. What I have particularly enjoyed using is the terrific low light shooting capability made possible through the cameras 'Twilight' mode, a feature that is automatically engaged when conditions warrant under the 'Superior Auto' setting. Bottom line is that I am getting better pictures now and deleting less when reviewing the shots I have taken.
customer_reviews.author: Dogzonboard

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for the Lightening Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, without the one-day deal on this camera, I would not have bought it...but I am way glad that I did...and now that I have used it I will be recommending it even at its regular price. It might have been designed with me in mind. I like the Auto modes and the Creative options...so easy! I like the Scene modes. The lens is excellent! Image quality is way better than my P&Ss. I just love it. The only thing that disappointed me was that the lens cap has no tether. It is easy to find one that does, but still, Sony, come on!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small, good-great pics
customer_reviews.text: This camera goes everywhere with me, its cheap enough, small enough, and works well enough to get the shots I dont plan for. I have 3 other cameras I will purposely take before this one, but this one has given me the chance at some wonderful pics just because it is there, also the shots I can manage from this little guy have received praise. best camera is the one you have with you, and this camera is there in times of need.
customer_reviews.author: King George

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera; I am interested in learn about photography for hobby purposes, so this was a great investment without breaking the bank. I really love the fact that you can use a SD card instead of just the proprietary Sony memory card. It not a full SLR or as powerful but its a lot better than the pictures my Samsung S3 takes. That was also a secondary reason I got the camera, indoor shots were bad with the S3 (Indoor low light conditions).
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great shots
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing pictures. In daylight, outdoor shots are difficult due to glare, it is hard to see the display on the LCD screen. We purchased a lcd viewfinder to remidy this. This is a sunshade. While on a hike we took a picture of 2 people rockclimbing. We were quite far away. Wanted to test zoom. When we got home we downloaded picture and saw there were 4 climbers, not 2! we were amazed at quality of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butler

customer_reviews.title: superior image quality
customer_reviews.text: With this camera you get amazing images as it has the aps-c sensor which is larger than the micro 4/3 of it's competitors. It has some nice features and settings to help make those images even better too! what you don't get is a view finder, touch screen, image stabilization in camera (it's in the lens), hot shoe, and a few other little things. So it's a great entry level CSC that will give you dynamite pictures without a lot of pizazz......but do you really need that? OH and great price :)
customer_reviews.author: Tybee

customer_reviews.title: Best performance in the smallest possible package
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera I can always have with me. I have the a850 and the a57 with a whole bunch of lenses but I was missing a lot of opportunities because I'm not able to have these fine cameras with me all the time. This little camera fits that bill perfectly, a APS-C sensor camera barely bigger than a point and shoot. I am perfectly happy with the performance so far, the images are crisp as you would expect from a DSLR. The camera does a great job at compensating the limitations of the lens (due to its size) and the high-iso results are pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Unfug

customer_reviews.title: It is OK
customer_reviews.text: It was the lighting-deal, and a first mirror-less camera. The output is above average (better than my Panasonic Lumix 6 series) FWIW, the Nokia 928 on Verizon actually as good as in low-light. The Nokia does not have the removable memory (and it is heavy as a phone) I will keep this and learn more about it. I hope for new firmware release to fix the red color issue in iA mode.
customer_reviews.author: D. nguyen

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Whatta Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This camera arrived promptly in the original packaging, in perfect shape, appearing to be brand new. This vendor did a nice job with this purchase. The camera ia ALL that I wanted, and much, much more. The 16-50 standard lens is very sharp, with a great range. Shot several shots at a Dodger night game, with excellent results. I LOVE THIS CAMERA!! Using the RainbowImaging lens adapter, i can add many of my Sony Alpha lenses, a wonderful cost saver and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different model.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst camera I ever owned. I've owned many cameras in my lifetime and most of them were Sony. I love Sony's cameras but this one never took a clear picture in the three years I owned it. I was always constantly trying to update the ISO, I'd update this, update that, and still EVERY single picture came out dark and blurry. I wouldn't recommend this camera to anyone. I finally got rid of it and purchased a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have owned!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, mainly for my parents to use but, I have fallen in love with this camera!! It takes great pictures in low light, the pictures are always of great quality and that is with the lens that came with it!! I cannot recommend this camera enough, to anyone that is looking for one. My only complaint would be the lack of lenses for it but, give it time and I know they will come!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Steinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Beautiful pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Beautiful pictures, small and compact. Lens broke after few months, got it repair under warranty. Then broke again 3 months after warranty expired. $200 to fix it. Goes in the trash if breaks again. Did research and lots of people have same issue, lens mounting problem
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Great photos but no viewing lens.
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, point and shoot cameras are a dime a dozen. What I like about my Sony NEX is it is easy to use and takes fantastic pictures. It has many features for advanced photographers to take advantage of. However, the lack of a viewing lens makes taking photos hard to accomplish when you're trying to view your shot through the screen in a bright setting. This is a bit of a bummer because i love the quality photos ive been able to take. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase especially considering I bought it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Tipp

customer_reviews.title: Great Shots and Great Camera...broke in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a great price and a great shooting camera. Love it a lot. However, I was on vacation and the camera broke. No I did not drop it. I was taking a shot and the camera would not recognize the lenze. So I contact Sony and now it is in the shop. Not a good first experience with a Sony product. Hopefully yours does not break. Mine did. Overall, camera quality of pictures and features are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 3 years. Served me well.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after 3 years (bought new batteries but that didn't help). Camera isn't light but it's not too big either. Can fit in a coat pocket. Takes great pictures. Really enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: a real bad custom service
customer_reviews.text: it work for few months and then the camera stop recognizing the lens. No matter what I did (clean contacts etc) helped. Then when I contacted Sony we had very little response, the only possible thing was to send it to their repair shop. We had to call to get anywhere, a real bad custom service.
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures from a small camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for half a year now, and I'm very happy with it. Pros: - size - built-in flash - pretty good performance in low light - smart enough for beginners, tweakable enough for more advanced photographers Cons: - menu is not entirely intuitive - some functions are way too many clicks away (e.g. display brightness) - flash is too bright (and settings are too hidden) - on auto, there's some overexposure - no viewfinder
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: sony camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased for me by my husband, I wanted to be able to take quality picture of my beautiful granddaughter. It was exactly as described, It takes great pictures and is easy for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna  E Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great all-purpose mirrorless....
customer_reviews.text: Am loving this upgrade to my Canon S90 for pictures in general but also for professional use in capturing my the events I DJ at for my website. The autofocusing lens that comes with it is a good starter lens and I'll probably upgrade it down the line for different applications. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DJ MinWah

customer_reviews.title: Nice pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera for traveling in places where a large camera would attract un-wanted attention. And sice the camera takes such great pictures, the larger camera wasn't missed. Also, I can adapt other lenses to this camera making it super fun to use and I can use it manually!! Would highly recommend this camera for the day to day user.
customer_reviews.author: Duane C. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for beginners who want to learn photography
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera equivalent to entry level SLR. It is equipped with so many features that can challenge any entry level SLR. Picture quality is awesome and it's 5/5 star is also considering it's light weight. For me this camera is better than any other camera in this price range like Canon T3i.
customer_reviews.author: Raks

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Can take great pictures, especially if you know what you're doing with the manual controls. Lack of a viewfinder hasn't really been a problem. The only bummer is its low light performance, but if you had an f1.8 lens on there it would probably work great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cameara
customer_reviews.text: We had other small point-and-shoot Sony cameras and also a few from Canon, Nikon and Olympus but this NEX is by far the best with vivid colors, excellent sharpness and works even better than the big Nikon camera (with exchangeable lens) we have. It's worth every penny and more...
customer_reviews.author: Anh Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still playing around with the settings. Night shots are a problem for me somewhat. But it's fast, light,and portable. Bought this for my trip so I can't wait to fully utilize the camera and document my trip. DSLR will stay home for this lighter option. And I think I miss the viewfinder. I just couldn't justify double the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bimmerfest80

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes fantastic photos with very little work. I needed a camera for my upcoming honeymoon and wedding so I purchased after doing a little research. Mission Accomplished! I leave it on auto and point and click... Great photos! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wilbraham

customer_reviews.title: A really solid camera. I debated between this and ...
customer_reviews.text: A really solid camera. I debated between this and the Nex 5 and 6 as well as some other for a while. I opted for the least expensive model because I know from experience that I won't use a camera that doesn't fit in my pocket very often. The reason it lost a star is because the shutter is rather loud, even for a camera of this type.
customer_reviews.author: ryan12101

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I bought it for my wife but I think I am having more fun with it. It takes crystal clear pictures. I usually shoot in aperture control but have not taken it off auto and every picture has come out great. It actually does a better job than my Sony a550 in a lot of situations. Did I mention it's small; so easy to carry with you. Fun camera to own and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kit L. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Home run Sony
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using the little camera. It has provided some really nice photos, probably the best I've ever taken. I have even started experimenting with the interchangeable lenses for the E mount design. I think sony has really produced a nice affordable camera. I'll probably never use my Nikons again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry N Haag

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a ton of features, it does take some time to learn all the functions. One thing I really liked is that the description is on view screen for each function that you scroll to so you don't have to get the manual out to look everything up.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera! I put it on i-intelligent auto and it takes photos like a professional would! I am an amateur when it comes to photo taking and this camera is amazing. Worth the money. Disclaimer: This camera does not come with an SD card so make sure you buy that- because I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: sundrop

customer_reviews.title: Pro camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is really good, I use it a lot in battery save mode, and haven't charged for up to 3 days. The image quality is excellent, and the intelligent+ mode is like hiring a personal photographer. The flexible display it's great for selfies or group images, you put it anywhere and the camera do the rest, no need to setup or set timer. I got a monopod at the same time and helps to make the most of the camera. The only thing this version is missing is the built in Wi-fi which is included on the NEX-7, but obviously it's included in the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cambronero

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I just upgraded from a Canon digital Elph camera because I wanted to have the option of changing lenses. I'm still learning to use it, but at this price, it makes a great camera and takes wonderful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Managed to get an open box through Amazon Warehouse for $204 including the lens. Has held up over a couple different trips over the last month. Takes great pictures for the $204 I paid for it. Brother just got an NEX-6 and that does take better pictures, but he paid over twice what I paid to get a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: camera is perfect
customer_reviews.text: the function and use of this camera works very well in our Department who always have event mostly every week and this camera have a nice picture for each shot..
customer_reviews.author: Lenard

customer_reviews.title: The best camera I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera in a small package. I am trying to get used to the small body as it can be tricky abit when you switch from a full-body camera. The quality is top-notch. The stock lens is awesome. Worth the price 100% recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Martin

customer_reviews.title: Poor body construction. Amazing pictures.
customer_reviews.text: The camera shoots amazing pictures and videos however, within two months the back starting popping off from front of camera. I have not dropped it, hit it, or abused it in any way. Poor construction. I received the shipment from Amazon almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Z.

customer_reviews.title: good for hiking & nature photography
customer_reviews.text: Camera is small and light-weight, good for hiking & nature photography. Excellent macro. Stabilization is excellent even when zooming in movie mode. However in movie mode the zoom mechanism is very loud and can be heard on the video. Also both pictures and videos are a little dark even in open sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: lighthammer

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera met all my photo requirements and the picture quality is excellent. Panoramic picture is pretty easy to take and comes great with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: pks09

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Nikon D3100 and one to replace my girlfriends Nikon Coolpix. This camera is the perfect size to carry around, I found that full size DSLR's are too big and it deters me from taking my camera. The picture quality is great and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: More than happy
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honnest, this camera works more than I expected, and now I have to ask a photography lessons to use it, 100% happy. I'm pretty sure I will explote it with all features it has.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Great for photos and video!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this camera for some time now and now that I have it I absolutely love it. The photos are amazing and the video quality is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Barber

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures with typical Sony annoyances
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes good pictures. My other camera is a phone, and it doesn't take great pictures. This camera takes good low light photos and has decent software with convenient automatic features. What is most annoying is that I need to use the USB cable and charge adapter that Sony provides to charge the camera (via USB). I was hoping that I could use any of my USB plug adapters and USB cables to charge the camera, but when I tried different combinations, only using the Sony USB cable and plug adapter worked. The cable is really short too. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Penner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect travel camera for my needs. The lens is sharp, and the large sensor makes for good quality pictures. I shoot in RAW format, and use Lightroom 5 for processing. I am very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Denholm

customer_reviews.title: I love my new camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been craving for this camera for a while. Got it when it was on sale and totally loved it when I tried it first time. There are many functions that will need to be studied.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price....!
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera for the price, quality is same or better than entry level DSLR, my d3200 is too heavy to carry around but this is prefect for travel .......
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera to serve as back up of my Nikon D7000
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to carry around in my jacket. The pictures are beautiful especially in low light environment. I rarely use the built-in flash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera ,great price .
customer_reviews.text: I am abosutley in love with this camera . Came packaged amazingly . Great resolution and very user friendly . You will need to buy a charger or additional batteries. Update 11.16.15 I still love this camera but today after not using for about 3 weeks went to turn it on and its says lens not attached properly . Not sure what happen there ,I've researched and its a common issue going to take it in to a professional to check it out .
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for new photographers looking to get more serious about their hobby. I love the size and look of the camera; It's light and slim enough to take hiking (I have even carried biking and skiing) but takes amazing pictures. Biggest complaint is the view screen- hard to see on sunny days because of glare. Also, can be a little slow between shots. So far, I'm very glad I bought this camera.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY

customer_reviews.title: compact camera
customer_reviews.text: quite easy to use and very compact. I love it. The only thing that is a little bad is to cover the lens, a simple button that is so easy to forgive it in any place
customer_reviews.author: Delphine  H.

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera, bought it used. We recently have a new baby in the house and it takes the best pictures and captures all those amazing moments you never want to forget! I also use it to take pictures of my clients for makeup artistry and it does the makeup justice! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: great image quality
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Finally a point and shoot that can get accurate focus even in not so bright setting. Finally!!!
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the selfie takers
customer_reviews.text: Takes great selfies and night shots. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: joe man.

customer_reviews.title: Good till the lens failed.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy enough with this camera after purchase. But then this week, less than two years after purchase, the lens has failed utterly. First I got an error saying the lens could not be recognized. I removed it, cleaned the contacts and re-attached it and it seemed to be fine. But a few days later the lens is physically failing: the zoom mechanism seems to have failed and the lens just "falls" back and forth when the camera is turned upside down, and doesn't respond to the zoom lever. Has this happened to anyone else with this lens? How did you go about addressing it?
customer_reviews.author: Arnab Chakladar

customer_reviews.title: Good hydbrid Camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a DSLR camera but ended up buying this hybrid camera and it is working fine as per my needs
customer_reviews.author: nookuser2012

customer_reviews.title: Good photos...Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I just leave mine on superior auto mode and it works great. I will be looking into a wide angel lens for more flexibility on this camera
customer_reviews.author: AngieT2

customer_reviews.title: bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a lot of decent features. It is not the best in any one category but it is unbeatable at the price.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror-less camera
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror-less camera. Auto-focus is OK but could be faster. Good low light images. No viewfinder. Large image sensor for small size camera. Sony lenses available for NEX cameras in good but not great.
customer_reviews.author: skw

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling and take selfies; I buy it specially for a long travel I will make with my GF and the camera really worked perfect, we took such awesome pictures, and the battery is great, the charge last for days; I use different lens and they fit well, even with adapter non from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Niels

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I own the NEX 5N and some lenses, but the 16-50 mm zoom on the 3N is quick and easy to use. Very handy. Pocketable.
customer_reviews.author: Philip W. Knopp

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera was exactly as advertised. Wanted something smaller than DSLR but with room to add lens. Nice feel in hand. Removed the neck strap after one session and added a single wrist strap. Has all the controls you might want, while retaining several auto modes that make it as easy as a point & shoot. My wife and daughter took great shots after only being shown where the on-off button and zoom was located. I have used the flash quite a bit as fill-in when faces were shaded or dimly lit. Have not yet learned all the features so will post an update.
customer_reviews.author: JNME

customer_reviews.title: I love it very much !
customer_reviews.text: This camera cost performance ratio is very high. It contains all the features I need. The only drawback is not a metal shell. Express soon, but packing a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: zhanghill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I love
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really an expert when it comes to camera but this one just exceeds my expectation! I was just actually looking for a compact camera that i could carry anywhere when I travel. And this one, it produced good quality pictures that I can't stop making books from shutterfly. :)) just what I love in a camera. :)
customer_reviews.author: danicagrac3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, nice price !
customer_reviews.text: I love this entry level mirrorless, I use the LA-EA 4 with my a-mount lenses, and it has a nice noise perfomance !
customer_reviews.author: Diego Silva

customer_reviews.title: looks like it'll be fun
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it much more than to play w it around house. looks like just the ticket. i bought it when i couldn't find my trusty old(er) cannon and i needed a camera for an upcoming trip. nice size, easy/simple to use, pic's are great. it was on sale, so a great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: marta greenhoe kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is real. It wont work ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is real. It wont work with lenses bought from SONY themselves. I have sent the lenses to Sony multipule times and they work with all Sony cameras except this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Bonds

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the lens is good. The best thing about it so far is that the pictures are so vibrant. Very beautiful. I also like that I can fit this camera in my purse. And I have to admit that the quality of the picture is wayyyy better than the point and shoot. One thing that I don't like is the body. It's plastic and it looks kind of cheap. But I guess they use that material because of its light weight. Other than that, this camera is a keep. I'm lovin' it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: okay camera
customer_reviews.text: i give it 4 stars for the quality of the pictures which are really great. even the creative effects are awesome/ 3 starts only however because i could hardly see the image when taking pictures in bright lights/sunlight. that is very inconvenient. also difficult when you ask someone to take a picture of you cause they can't see a thing. sadly, i have to return this and is currently looking for a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and on time
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Unfortunately, the camera stopped recognizing the lens two weeks after a got the camera and three days before returning from my trip. I am glad Amazon replaced it. The user experience to attach and detach the lens cover is not friendly. It arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: giordain

customer_reviews.title: Very Good little camera the fit in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: I have a Canon EOS 60D with 4 lenses and there is no way that i can take it while i'm biking, runing or traveling. And this is the prefect for all of them. It only take small space in my bag and take good picture as EOS 500D. plus you can change the lens like DSLRs.
customer_reviews.author: Yue Yu

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: bought a Cannon and wasn't impressed, sucked AA batteries and that flash was super slow. this camera is fast and the battery life is great
customer_reviews.author: Brent Herber

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a good camera for beginners like me, y found it very easy to use and I'm happy with the results I got with the photographs
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera! It is super easy to use, and takes amazing pictures. With two clicks you can go from beautiful single shots to high speed action shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Potter

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic camera! Small yet with all the features of a SLR! Great for trips.. Might need to replace cover if not attached.. (Easily lost)
customer_reviews.author: Alis Marachelian

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: We spent time researching cameras and found this to be the best camera and the best price! We absolutely love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Real Easy to Use and Great video and pictures. Very small and portable for the type or camera. Low light photos are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Warne

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This camera is capable of soo much but yet in a tiny package. The camera has so many features and modes its hard to contain your artistic side. I love the performance of the camera. It takes some of the most beautiful pictures and really stands up well against large DSLR cameras. Purchased this camera for an international trip because of its size and capabilities and am extremely pleased! Buy this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: He really enjoy taking every where on road
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my husband. He really enjoy taking every where on road trips

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...

customer_reviews.title: Great in portability
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built and good results. Price to performance ratio is the best in its class. Very nice replacement to Point & Shoot cameras.

customer_reviews.text: Great lens and perfect compact size! I love it! Took it on a trip to the Galapagos and it took some amazing shots!

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Got it last week, great picture quality and very light comparing to SLR. Best non SLR camera in its price range.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with it as a backup camera. Took good care of it yet after only 6 months of light usage it suddenly stopped working.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good starter level compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Christmas break and it was working fine. Although I'm not very interested in photographing, this is a good compact camera for starters.

customer_reviews.text: Camera has a hardware issue many of you will face. Please check  If you buy used or refurbished it's really hard to replace it. I couldn't. I wish I have bought Samsung :(

customer_reviews.title: Just couple words
customer_reviews.text: I like that camera. Actually, I haven't used it often, but I like quality and price. Moreover, it doesn't take too much place in my bag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Good picture quality. Yes, it has a view finder. Unlike Samsung NX2000.
customer_reviews.author: KSC

customer_reviews.title: Charger doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: In order to use my new camera I had to use my android tablet charger! I'm glad most technology is becoming universal in that area now so I had that to compare to make sure it was the charger and not the camera. Seriously, that is the cheapest thing I have seen. If you're shelling out $300+ for a camera one would expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: FalishaB5

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Nice zoom, flash, flip screen, and quality. Will use this camera for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, hard to see what you are shooting in sunlight
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures, but lack of viewfinder makes it hard to see what you are shooting in sunlight due to the reflection on the LCD display, almost unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq F. Malik

customer_reviews.title: Not all cameras are made equal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera because it is basically a compact DSLR. It does not disappoint. The pictures are clear and sharp. I have another 16mp camera and while the pictures look almost the same when viewed on a screen. When you zoom in, that is when you see the difference. You can tell this camera has alot more details. You can tell by the other reviews and indepth analysis. I will just say this...you are getting a DSLR in a small compact camera. Great for days where you don't want good quality pictures but do not want to lug your DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Simpleofmind

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, easy to use. Nice pictures since in dark enviroment. Good relation cost x benefit. xx xx xx xx
customer_reviews.author: Renato Castilho

product_meta.title: Sony NEX-3NL/B Mirrorless Digital Camera Kit (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingYou get incredible detail and gorgeous enlargements. Thanks to the large 16.1 megapixel APS-C sensor size and Sony Exmor APS HD CMOS technology, the camera achieves high resolution with no penalty in low-light sensitivity or sensor noise. Use this comparison chart to compare all Sony Alpha Mirrorless cameras.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 A+ NEX3NL 





Meet your new partner for life. The world’s smallest and lightest camera10, NEX-3N produces fantastic high-resolution photos, Full HD movies and charming self-portraits, all with excellent edge-to-edge sharpness. A superbly designed, feature-filled interchangeable-lens camera that includes a large APS-C sensor, built-in pop-up flash, 4 fps continuous shooting, Auto Object Framing and much more. All the camera you need to capture the finer aspects of life with the greatest of ease. 
Technology 16.1 MP Exmor® HD APS sensor Get incredible detail and gorgeous enlargements. Thanks to the large 16.1 megapixel APS-C sensor size and Sony Exmor® APS HD CMOS technology, the camera achieves gorgeous, high resolution photos even in low light. Retractable power zoom lens A new zoom lever on the body of the camera allows for effortless one-handed operation and smooth zooming even when shooting self-portraits, bringing compact camera convenience to the realm of interchangeable-lens models. Self-portraits made easy The NEX-3N’s flip up LCD screen makes shooting self-portraits a snap. Include other people, experiment with interesting angles or shoot against famous landmarks. When you press the shutter, the camera does all the work. Full HD movies4 Record stunning high quality 1080 Full HD Video in either 60i or 24p frames per second. Records in your choice of 1080/60i or 24p Blu-Ray quality AVCHD™ format or in PC-friendly 1080/30p MP4 format. Built-in flash Perfect when an extra burst of light is needed to get the shot, the built-in Guide Number 6 flash2 combines with high ISO sensitivity to enable shooting in just about any setting. Auto Object Framing fills
the frame with your subject Now it’s easy to create beautifully framed images whether shooting people, close-ups or action. Simply photograph your subject and Auto Object Framing saves a trimmed image (in addition to original) that’s more professionally composed. 
Product description and full feature list Explore the full range of features and options below. 
Up to ISO 16000 sensitivity with advanced noise reduction
With a new Exmor sensor that features the same adaptive noise reduction technology from Sony’s flagship SLT-A99V, the NEX-3N easily offers a wide range of sensitivity from ISO 100 to ISO 16000.

Newly designed anti-slip grip
Perfect for self-portraits or casual snaps, the natural form ensures quick, comfortable handling and makes the camera easy to carry around. In addition, the textured grip prevents slipping even when shooting one-handed or when using exceptionally large lenses.

Compact, easy-to-carry
PZ 16-50mm kit lens
For the ultimate in portability, the NEX-3N includes the collapsible SELP1650 as the kit lens. Ideal when traveling or anytime a compact, lightweight camera-combo is desired.

Picture Effect modes
The NEX-3N includes 15 effects that can be applied to photos or movies, giving you the means to vastly expand your artistic repertoire. The ability to view effects in real-time on the LCD screen11 before the shot lets you experiment with different looks until you are satisfied with the result.

Photo Creativity feature
NEX-3N provides easy access to most Picture Effect settings as well as controls for Background Defocus, Brightness, Color and Vividness. Just activate Photo Creativity, choose the appropriate item then adjust while viewing in real-time on the LCD screen. The ability to combine settings offers nearly unlimited creative control, and lets you compensate for tricky lighting.



Superior Auto mode
Use Superior Auto mode to shoot photos and movies with the ease of a compact digital camera. In this mode, the camera recognizes the current shooting environment then adjusts settings for optimal results. Superior Auto also includes Auto HDR and Hand-held Twilight modes, both of which employ image compositing technology to handle difficult lighting by recording multiple images at high speed then compositing them to produce the final photo.

Anti-Motion Blur mode
Corrects for subject movement to capture amazingly clean and sharp images in low light. The camera leverages the large, APS-C image sensor and captures six images in a fraction of a second. Combining the data from all six creates a single image that minimizes subject blur.

Hand-held Twilight Mode
Get cleaner and sharper nighttime pictures—beyond the capability of traditional cameras—without using flash or a tripod. The camera leverages the large, APS-C image sensor and captures six images in a fraction of a second. Combining the data from all six creates a single image of extraordinary detail and low noise.

Face Detection/Smile Shutter
Set NEX-3N to recognize faces and smiles. Face Detection locates up to eight faces in a composition then adjusts exposure, white balance and other settings based on these faces. Smile Shutter — adjustable in three levels — automatically takes a shot when smiles in the scene are at their brightest.

Creative Style
Tailor the look of photos and movies before shooting. Choose from one of six settings — Standard, Vivid, Portrait, Landscape, Sunset or Black & White — depending on the scene or your creative intent.



Speed Priority Continuous mode
Freeze fast-moving subjects by shooting at up to 4 fps. This is the ideal solution for photographing sports, children at play or other action.

Up to 480 Shots6 of battery life
Take up to 480 shots on a single charge6 with Sony® lithium ion Stamina™ battery power. Sony's InfoLITHIUM® battery system enables you to see the percent of power remaining, so you can keep shooting in confidence.

PlayMemories Home
supplied software9
Free, easy-to-use PlayMemories Home™ image management software automatically installs onto Windows PC’s for Sony Digital Camera users. Download photos and movies onto your computer then view, organize, edit, retouch, print, burn to disk, share or upload to social networking websites.

Supplied accessories
The kit includes a SELP1650 lens, lens cap, NP-FW50 InfoLithium rechargeable battery , AC-UB10 USB AC charger (in-camera battery charging), shoulder strap, body cap, and Micro USB cable.

Lock-on Auto Focus
Using the 15-point autofocus sensor and Sony's subject recognition technologies, Object Tracking AF can maintain accurate focus on your subject even when it changes position in the frame. 

Sweep Panorama™ Mode
Capture expansive landscapes automatically. Press the shutter, sweep vertically or horizontally. The camera does the rest, continuously shooting images and stitching them together for an astounding paroramic image. 




Sony Suggested Accessories 

> A-mount Adapter (w/ TMT)
LA-EA2 > Rechargeable Battery pack
NP-FW50 > External Battery Charger
BC-VW1 > Sling-bag Soft Carrying Case
LCS-SB1/B > Just-fit Camera-body Case
LCS-EB32/B > A-mount Adapter
LA-EA1 > Accessory Kit
ACC-HDFW > Soft LCD Protector Sheet
PCK-LS1EM > NEX General Camera Case
LCS-EME/BI 
2. In meters, IS0 100

4. Records in 29 minute segments

6. Actual performance varies based on settings, environmental conditions, and usage. Battery capacity decreases over time and use.

9. Files compatible with iMovie® '09 or later on Mac. Software not compatible with Mac OS® X.

10. Among interchangeable-lens cameras with an APS-C sensor and built-in flash as of February 2013.

New SELP1650 lens with motor zoom lever and body control
Create easy self-portraits with 180° tilting LCD screen
